message.name: ERR_PDC_ENABLED_INVOCATION_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: This action cannot be carried out as participant data case is enabled for persons/prospect persons.

message.name: ERR_PDC_INSERT_METHOD_UNAUTHORISED_CALLER
message.locale: This function can only be called from the Participant Data Case component.

message.name: ERR_PDC_FV_CREATE_CONCERN_ROLE_TYPE_INVALID
message.locale: Participant data case cannot be created for %1s concern role type.

message.name: ERR_PDC_FV_RESOLVE_CONCERN_ROLE_TYPE_INVALID
message.locale: Participant data case cannot be resolved for %1s concern role type.

message.name: ERR_PDC_MRE_CASE
message.locale: Multiple participant data cases found for concern role.

message.name: ERR_PDC_XRV_CASE_EXIST
message.locale: Active participant data case already exists for this concern role.

message.name: ERR_PDC_CASE_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: No Active participant data case exists for this concern role.

message.name: ERR_PDC_EVIDENCE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: This action cannot be carried out as no corresponding participant evidence record could be found.

message.name: ERR_PDC_MAINTENANCE_EVIDENCE_NOT_IN_LIST
message.locale: Shared evidence was not updated as evidence details for update returned by custom maintenance style implementation is not in the provided list. Please updated custom implementation to select one from the provided list.
